DOC.brief_title: Lifestyle Therapy Youth With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Youth age 10-20 year live type 2 diabetes currently insulin therapy randomly assign either lifestyle intervention group control group . The lifestyle intervention group meet 2-3 time per week 16 week take part healthy living education session involve physical activity , healthy cooking , healthy garden start sustain healthy lifestyle change . At begin end 16 week investigator measure participant ' blood sugar , height , weight , cholesterol , triglycerides liver enzymes . The investigator also take picture kidney , heart blood vessel use ultrasound . Those youth assigned control group receive 16 week intervention follow 16 week control period .
